name: Amstrad-CPC-464
description:
Amstrad-CPC-464
Digital ink drawing on wacom EMR tablet.

Bouzige Guillaume (2020)

This artwork is a nostalgic drawing of my very first computer. I was born in 1984 and when I grew up at around 7-8 years old I started to play around with this Amstrad CPC 464. I have learn basic coding for fun, play with some cassette games.
